front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Gas-Insulated Substations Rated 1 kV to 52 kV
front.abstract: A guide to the technical requirements for the design, fabrication, testing, and installation of indoor gas-insulated substations (GIS) 1 kV up to 52 kV are covered. Parameters to be supplied by the purchaser are suggested and technical requirements for the design, fabrication, testing, and installations to be furnished by the manufacturer are established.
